title: First Ladies National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Visits to the Saxton House and the Educational and Research Center are by paid guided tour only. Reservations are highly recommended due to limits on tour size. Reservations are required for groups of 6 or more.  Admission Adults: $7 Seniors: $6 Children under age 18: $5 Please note visitors holding The America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass receive $2 off regular admissions. School programs are free, by reservation only. Please call 330-452-0876 or email mrhodes@firstladies.org.  Passes Please note that the America the Beautiful passes can be obtained at Cuyahoga Valley National Park in Brecksville, Ohio or James A. Garfield National Historic Site in Mentor, Ohio. First Ladies National Historic Site does not sell these passes.
